articles.description: Rockstar Games have announced a new update that will be released on December 15th, for Xbox One, Playstation4, and PC. The Cayo Perico HEIST. The Cayo Perico HEIST will be set on a completely new island, goodbye Los Santos, hello Cayo Perico. This HEIST will …
articles.content:
